Posts.Content: Jun 21, 2008 07:26PM durgariand wrote: Folks,      My Mom is going in for a lumpectomy Monday, and it will follow with radiation.  This site is great!  Most of the info links are only on-line access though.  Is there any sort of .pdf, all encompassing document on the site anywhere?  I'd like to be able to download something I can review and email to family without having to be online.  Thank you. David
